author: doronc
msg: LUCENE-909: Demo targets for running the demo.

author: djd
msg: DERBY-2735 Make 28502 exception statement level severity so that IDUtil.getUserAuthorizationId()
can be used anywhere a valid authentication identifier is required. Ensure a non-session level severity
exception during a connection creation failure is handled as a session level severity.
Add testing of invalid authentication identifiers to  SYSCS_GET_USER_ACCESS.

author: sebb
msg: The clear() method was defined in the following interfaces:
The methods serve different purposes, so two of them were renamed:
the Clearable method is now clearData() and the JMeterGUIComponent method is now clearGui().
3rd party add-ons may need to be rebuilt.
